messages.message: Which country to visit next? This is a photo with my friends - celebrating in Bali my-top-places.jpg

messages.name: Aada Laine
messages.message: @har_adams wow its amazing, I want to buy a van and travelling next year

messages.name: Nala Hester
messages.message: Working from a van in Australia isnâ€™t feasible if you need internet. It may have improved over the last years but I spent some time in a camper van around Tasmania and internet was a real problem (and Tasmania is tiny compared to the rest of the country).

messages.name: Ramon Bateman
messages.message: @aa_da What's the reason for the van? Saving money or just like to get outside? If you've got a stable source of income you could always do some short term Airbnbs + buy a truck/topper, build a platform in the back. That way you can always convert it back to a truck and sleep in an apartment if you want.
